title: Dastūr-i- ʻushshāq = The Book of lovers : the allegorical romance of princess Husn (Beauty) and prince Dil (Heart) by Muḥammad Yaḥya ibn Sībak, known as Fattahī of Nīshāpur ; ed. by R. S. Greenshields
author: Fattāḥī, -approximately 1448.

title: Dastūr-i-ʻUshshāq, "The book of lovers": the allegorical romance of Princess Husn (Beauty) and Prince Dil (Heart) by Muhammad Yaḥyā ibn Sībak, known as Fattāhī of Nīshāpur. Ed. by R. S. Groenshields
author: Fattāhī, d. 1448.

title: Edward Fitzgeralds Rubaiyat des Omar Khayyam Letzte fassung deutsch von H.W. Nordmeyer
author: Omar Khayyam.

title: The Lady of the Lotus, Rup Mati, queen of Māndu. A strange tale of faithfulness by Āhmud-ul-Umri, Turkomān. Translated, with introductin & notes, together with twenty-six poems attributed to Queen Rup Mati, done into verse by L. M. Crump, C.I.E.
author: Ȧhmad al-ʻUmrī.

title: Maykhānah : yaʻnī sāqīʹna̲mahʹhā-yi mutaqadimi̲n va mutākhirīn tā sanah 1028 H maʻa tarājim-i ānhā taʾlīf-i Mullā ʻAbd al-Nabī Fakhr al-Zamānī Qazvīnī ; bi-iʻtināʾ-i Muḥammad Shafīʻ
author: Qazvīnī, ʻAbd al-Nabī Fakhr al-Zamānī, active 1609-1631.

title: Report on a linguistic mission to Afghanistan Series C 1-2
author: Morgenstierne, Georg, 1892-1978.
